body:
Magarena 1.48

The AI played Dominus of Fealty. When its ability triggers, the AI "may" select a "target permanent". On the spell stack this target is listed as "(yes)". As far as I can see, there is no way to see what the target is without resolving the ability and checking its effects.

I would expect to see the target on the spellstack, maybe even visually linked to the playing board.
author: [pfeif...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110570234444309201741/)
title: Target not displayed

comments.body: made a commit on my clone which fixes it.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

content:
_From [pfeif...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110570234444309201741/) on April 23, 2014 17:54:04_

Magarena 1.48

The AI played Dominus of Fealty. When its ability triggers, the AI "may" select a "target permanent". On the spell stack this target is listed as "(yes)". As far as I can see, there is no way to see what the target is without resolving the ability and checking its effects.

I would expect to see the target on the spellstack, maybe even visually linked to the playing board.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=591_
